executable.title: Cancellous Analysis
executable.description: Perform Cancellous Analysis on an image
executable.contributor: Joseph Szatkowski (Washington University in St. Louis)
executable.acknowledgements: Developed by the Washington University in St. Louis Musculoskeletal Reseach Center with the assistance of Michael Brodt, Anish Jagannathan, Matthew Silva, and Simon Tang.\n This file was partially funded by NIH grant P30 AR074992.

image.name: mask
image.label: Mask
image.description: Mask representing only the bone (not the medullary cavity) with pores covered

float.name: lowerThreshold
float.label: Lower Threshold
float.description: The lower threshold for bone in the image

float.name: upperThreshold
float.label: Upper Threshold
float.description: The upper threshold for bone in the image

float.name: voxelSize
float.label: Voxel Size
float.description: The length of 1 voxel side in mm

float.name: intercept
float.label: Intercept
float.description: The slope intercept for density conversion

string.name: inputName
string.label: Input Name
string.description: The name of the input image

string.name: output
string.label: Output Directory
string.description: The directory to output data files to
